      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getDifferentTileMapFromBoard

      private Map<Coordinate,TileSubjectView> getDifferentTileMapFromBoard(TileSubject[][] updatedBoard)
      Retrieves all the graphical tile subjects and their position from the board matrix passed as parameter that are different from the actual board displayed
      Parameters:
      updatedBoard - the updated board that is potentially different from the one displayed
      Returns:
      every graphical tile displayed with its coordinate that is different from the content of updated board (parameter)

    • getDifferentTileMapFromBookshelf

      private Map<Coordinate,TileSubjectView> getDifferentTileMapFromBookshelf(TileSubject[][] updatedBookshelf)
      Retrieves all the graphical tile subjects and their position from the bookshelf matrix passed as parameter that are different from the actual bookshelf displayed
      Parameters:
      updatedBookshelf - the updated bookshelf that is potentially different from the one displayed
      Returns:
      every graphical tile displayed with its coordinate that is different from the content of updated bookshelf (parameter)

    • getDifferentTileFromBookshelf

    • hasDifferentContent

      private boolean hasDifferentContent(@NotNull Map.Entry<Coordinate,TileSubjectView> entry, @NotNull TileSubject[][] tileSubjectMatrix)
      Verify if a board entry (composed by a couple formed of coordinate and tile has a different content (tile subject) than the board in same row and column coordinate
      Parameters:
      entry - the board entry to be checked
      tileSubjectMatrix - the matrix representing the board
      Returns:
      true if the boardEntry has a different content than the content of board in the same position
